poem:
"Basking in the Brimstone Echoes"

Parade of pretence paces,
Bannon, a jester to the king -
Dons false prophecy,
swathing dusk in disquiet,
Gilded in deceit.

Shadowed in legal storms, 
His voice thieves the silence -
A crow's call in wane of day,
Echving through the empty palace.

Little men cast tenfold,
their ghosts dance in power's shadow,
Puppeteered in the faint glow 
of a fading White House portrait.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Steve Bannon hawks disinformation to support Trump as legal troubles mount The far-right strategist and Donald Trump loyalist Steve Bannon is again playing an influential role in the propaganda circles around the former US president as he bids to return to the White House, even as Bannon faces a barrage of legal problems. The conspiratorial Bannon, who spearheaded part of Trump’s 2016 presidential campaign and served as chief White House strategist in the first half". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
